node.title: Sydney man arrested over historical sexual assaults after DNA breakthrough
node.alt: A man is led away by police officers
node.description: A 51-year-old man is arrested over a series of sexual assaults which occurred in Sydney more than 15 years ago after police re-opened their investigation and made a DNA match.
node.content:
["A Sydney man has been arrested after\u00a0police made a DNA\u00a0breakthrough in their investigation of a\u00a0series of sexual assaults more than\u00a015 years ago.", "NSW Police have been investigating 13 separate sexual assaults that occurred\u00a0between August 2003 and November 2004.", "At the time of the incidents, police said a serial rapist had targeted women who had\u00a0left the doors and windows of their homes unlocked.", "The assaults were linked at the time by \"location and modus operandi\" and matching DNA was found at four of the crime scenes.", "More than 3,000 persons of interest have been investigated over the years.", "Despite help from the FBI in the US no one was charged over the incidents.", "As a result of not being able to track down the man dubbed the \"inner west rapist\", police even offered safety training to women across Sydney\u00a0so they could be better prepared to protect themselves.", "", "
The man was arrested over a series of sexual assaults more than 15 years ago.(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "Last year detectives began looking into the sexual assaults again\u00a0and completed a \"comprehensive investigative and forensic review\".", "A \"familial DNA link\" was made by criminalistic experts from NSW Health Pathology's Forensic and Analytical Science Service (FASS) earlier this year.", "A DNA match was then made following further inquiries which led to the arrest of a\u00a051-year-old man in\u00a0Panania in Sydney's south-west earlier this morning.", "He remains in police custody and is expected to be charged with multiple offences."]
